001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZoneOffset;
007import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
008import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
009import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder;
010
011public class PredicateFormatter {
012    private static final DateTimeFormatter FORMATTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder().appendInstant(3).toFormatter();
013
014    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(Boolean value) {
015        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant(String.format("%b", value));
016    }
017
018    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(LocalDate value) {
019        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of()
020                .constant(String.format("\"%s\"", value.format(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_DATE)));
021    }
022
023    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(ZonedDateTime value) {
024        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of()
025                .constant(String.format("\"%s\"", FORMATTER.format(value.withZoneSameInstant(ZoneOffset.UTC))));
026    }
027
028    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(Double value) {
029        return new ConstantQueryPredicate(value.toString());
030    }
031
032    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(Long value) {
033        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant(String.format("%d", value));
034    }
035
036    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(String value) {
037        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant(String.format("\"%s\"", escape(value)));
038    }
039
040    public static ConstantQueryPredicate format(LocalTime value) {
041        return ConstantQueryPredicate.of()
042                .constant(String.format("\"%s\"", value.format(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_LOCAL_TIME)));
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Internal: Escapes Strings like that (Scala notation) """query by name " test name"""
047     * @param s the unescaped String
048     * @return the escaped string
049     */
050    static String escape(final String s) {
051        return s.replace("\"", "\\\"");
052    }
053}
